what-is-this.title: What is this
what-is-this.content: This is a simple and easy to use HTML5 modular player. It's much different from many traditional JavaScript players, its modularized structure makes your work of removing the functionality you don't want become simple, and it's easier to add extra function by yourself.

why.title: Why
why.content: Some of my websites need a player that more rich-functionality than native HTML5 player, and each of them requires different functionality of the player, base on these needs, I created this player.
